title: Project Plan
content: Create trello and figma board to draft design and features

title: Create React App
content: Create base app structure and components folder

title: Create Components
content: 3 components for Title, Streams, Tasks and a Board container. The board is where the Streams(draggable) will sit. Tasks(draggable between Streams) will sit within Streams

title: Create Node server and PSQL DB
Create GitHub and Heroku repos
content: Save project work and git add., git commit, git push to repo. After Heroku is connected, connect GitHub repo and set up auto-push/build

title: Push and test
content: Test in live environment and fix bugs

title: Publish 'Wine Time' App
content: Published and Live. Time for a Wine!
